{"id":1237788002,"question_id":3405,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1713667287,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1237788002/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count the Number of Special Characters II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int numberOfSpecialChars(String word) {\n        Map<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        int res = 0;\n          Set<Character> nonspe = new HashSet<>();\n        \n        \n          Set<Character> isspe = new HashSet<>();\n        \n        for(char ch : word.toCharArray()){\n            \n            // if(ch>='a' && ch<='z') isspe.add(ch);\n            \n            if(ch>='A' && ch<='Z'){\n                \n                int idx= ch-'A';\n                \n                if(!map.containsKey((char)(idx+'a')))\n                    nonspe.add(ch);\n                \n            }\n            map.put(ch, map.getOrDefault(ch,0)+1);\n        }\n        \n        \n         for(int i=0; i<26; i++){\n            char cha = (char) ('a'+i);\n            char chA =  (char) ('A'+i);\n            \n            if(map.containsKey(cha) && map.containsKey(chA) && !nonspe.contains(chA)) res++;\n         }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-the-number-of-special-characters-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
